name: Cultural Evening 2016
body:
Cultural Evening is back for another year of showcasing the best, most diverse talents, cuisine and cultures that St Olave's has to offer. Come along for a guaranteed evening of music, dance, and more. And food.

### What's going on? Why am I here?
Cultural Evening is St Olave's yearly event celebrating the cultural diversity that is the lifeblood of St Olaves, ~~before exams start and everybody is assigned a candidate number~~. Continue reading for information about tickets, times and dates.

### Where can I buy tickets?
A limited number of tickets will be available outside the Sixth Form Common Room door. They will also be sold online, via sQuid. Prices are <this much> for students and <this much> for adults. Note that this year, *there will be no ticket sales on the door. Seriously.* So make sure you buy your tickets ASAP to ensure yourself and your families/friends/guests/~~random strangers off the street~~, places in our Great Hall on the night.

Ticket sales close on the Thursday, 17th of November.

### When is Cultural Evening?
Cultural Evening takes place on the Saturday, 19th of November.
Guests are welcome from 6:30 PM onwards.
Participants MUST arrive by 1:00 PM for a rehearsal and to help set up.

The event itself begins at 7:00 PM.

### Anything else?
~~It's banter.~~

### Support or Contact
If you have any questions, please see Advik Chaudhary in Year 13 (chaudharyadvik@gmail.com) or Eugene Lee in Year 12 (eugenelee456@gmail.com).

We hope to see you there!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
